first_turn: {00001}Hello, here is {00002}{00003}Base Your son-in-law was arrested by us yesterday for prostitution. This incident is not a good thing. If you want many people to know, pay 30,000 yuan in bail as soon as possible

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, this is {00002}{00003}Base. Your son-in-law was arrested for prostitution yesterday. Pay 30,000 yuan bail now.
I know this is a scam. You have no proof, and my son-in-law isn't involved. Stop calling.
Please, the matter is serious. If you don't pay, more will find out.

first_turn: Hello, here is the manual customer service of {00004}. As the exam is approaching, I donâ€™t know if the students in the same class need the exam questions. You can fill in the links that you spread to you and finish booking.

dialogue.text: Hello, this is manual customer service of {00004}. With the exam near, do your classmates need the exam questions? Fill the links we sent to finish booking.
Oh, I didn't know about this. Where can I find the links to complete the booking?
The links are sent to your email. Just follow the steps and complete payment to get access to the questions.

first_turn: I'll take the exam in a few days. How are you preparing? I'll take the exam next week. I'm so nervous

dialogue.text: I'll take the exam next week. Nervous already?
Yes, a bit stressed. What about you?
I have a special prep guide. Want me to send it? It guarantees a pass.
